HB Solution Context Profile (EP #5).purpose: EP Framework #5. Four-layer problem mapping (surface→real→adjacent→root), value chain (£0→£22.8K/yr per baker), solution strategy (infrastructure bundle), defensibility (kitchen moat + community + Acuity lock + 3-entity + Aloe Labs speed), evolution path (Service→Standardize→Automate→Software).

HB Format Selection (EP #7).purpose: EP Framework #7. Maps all HB offerings to Education/Automation/Implementation. Revenue chain (PDF→Calc→Booking→Hosting) separated from Custom Funnel and Workshop OS. Starting formats: Education (freebie) + Automation (calculator). Combination strategy and Aloe Labs dual-purpose lens.
